website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, high-quality board at a really good price.
pros: Plastic film it ships with came off easily
cons: Some buyers have noted problems with the installation kit this option ships with

customer_reviews.title: Homeschool Board
customer_reviews.text: This is working great for homeschool. We use it for All About Spelling's curriculum which uses magnetic tiles. My kids also love just drawing on the board with dry erase markers. So far, it has been very easy to clean. It wipes off completely without leaving faint lines as some older/cheaper boards can do.
customer_reviews.author: LoganMama

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a preschool teacher, I do have to say I love the size of the whiteboard it is not to small or to large. I was kind of worried because it was suppose to be delivered yesterday but it was running late. The whiteboard came out amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Was wary after reading some negative reviews - but product OK
customer_reviews.text: Apparently damage in shipping is a frequent occurrence with whiteboards. None of the brands and products are free of 1-star reviews, and in most cases the item arrived defective. Also, the box had numerous cautions about stacking, dropping, bumping in shipping. But I really needed this product, so I took a deep breath and ordered it. It arrived perfectly fine and was easy to assemble and install. Am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So useful
customer_reviews.text: We really like this dry erase board. I bought this to use when helping my granddaughter with her homework, particularly math. I have it over my own desk and it is really a handy item to have. The size is larger than I expected by this is a good thing as it gives us plenty of room to write and I can use it to post notes with some small magnets I purchased from Amazon. Come with mounting hardware, a marker and two magnets. I had several magnets already but bought some colorful pushpin magnets for cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Dixiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: After years of using the same white board at events, we were ready to buy new but concerned with what we would get. This white board was wrapped well for shipping and arrived clean and without a mark. We have used this white board for several music festivals and it has stood up well. It wipes super clean and has the bonus of being magnetic. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Blackwell - Here's My Take On It

customer_reviews.title: Came in good condition, just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: When shopping for a dry-erase board, I read NUMEROUS reviews of boards coming in broken, with defects, etc. This was across almost every product. I'm happy to say this one came in perfect condition. Just what I needed, as I wasn't willing to go all the way to a store in town to get one. I have no complaints. Your chances of getting something that gets broken in transit isn't 0%, but from my positive experience with this board, I'd say go for it if you're in the same situation (reading reviews, getting nervous, not sure if you should get one at all)
customer_reviews.author: Vijay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Home Schooling!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this white board. As soon as I removed it from the box, my two sons wanted to try it out. Clean, no dents or dings, magnets work great, came with all the stuff one needs for a small class, office, or business. Large enough for both my kids to see and small enough that my 4-year old can easily reach all across it without being cumbersome. Perfect! I bought an 8-pack of color dry erase markers along with the board (since it only comes with one small black dry erase marker) and they absolutely adore it.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Great magnetism!!!
customer_reviews.text: No creases or defects! I was worried about other reviews but it arrived in perfect condition. Easy to mount too. Love how light weight it is. Most happy with its excellent magnetism! Had tried a few other whiteboards and the weak magnets I got with my sons reading program just couldn’t stick to those other boards but they have no problem whatsoever sticking to this board!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic dry erase board
customer_reviews.text: This has a smooth silver metal frame. It comes with a moveable detachable ledge for laying the included pen to keep it handy. After it’s screwed into the wall with 4 corner screws, there are caps for covering the screws. I love that I can use magnets on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Diana P

customer_reviews.title: My best board
customer_reviews.text: So far this is my biggest board. I like the size and black frame. Came with markers and maybe some magnets. I use this board on a metal paint easel to draw diagrams and express ideas. the large space gives me more room to write complex equations and concepts. Other boards at 36" were to small so this filled a need for me. Having a large board is very satisfying, no more squeezing and writing to the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Malone

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t write reviews unless the product isn’t worth customers money. But I am HIGHLY impressed by how this item was shipped. I never have good experience with Amazon shipping and I must say the company made sure the product wouldn’t be damaged during shipping. This board is perfect to have in a home office. I am using half of it for work and half for school. Worth every penny. It’s a little heavy so I’m waiting to see how my 3M adhesives hold it on the wall (renting house) but I will be perm mounting it this December when I move into my house.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this magnetic white board to put in my den to track my workouts and it is exactly what I was looking for! Package arrived on time and was in perfect condition. The piece itself mounted without an issue (although I think the wall anchors they supply are WAY overkill since it is so light). Even my weaker magnets stick well and the board itself erases cleanly!! Could not be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Huge Crease
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a huge crease through the middle of the board and is not usable. There was no damage to the box, which was not an Amazon box (but the original manufacturer's box) and the packaging was good, so I can only assume that it was manufactured like this and it still shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No need to spend more - this works great
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and hung it up easily in the office a couple days ago. It came with a little marker that has an eraser+magnet on the cap, 2 little magnets (not terribly strong), some drywall/mounting hardware (I used my own E-Z self drilling anchors), a tray and little things to snap over the corners/screws so it looks finished. Seems to be good quality as writing/erasing is smooth/easy. It's sturdy and not twisted/warped like some lower cost/non metal (non-magnetic) dry erase boards. Glad I bought this product as it was a few $$ cheaper than other models of the same size and I can not find any faults.
customer_reviews.author: Mid Koaster

customer_reviews.title: Finally my own dry erase board. Teacher style!
customer_reviews.text: Nice design on installation....although the instructions werent super helpful. And i got to use my drill again! Please note....one side looks like a mirror....a cloudy mirror. We are using that side because of its duality....my son loves to dance before it, girls love to write on it. Havent gotten to the schooling it was intended for, yet. Summer is coming. Would probably purchase again....delivery was and issue. It was lost for a whe...but i got it. Amd Amazon helped me every step of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Made2mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have a couple Lockways whiteboards and this one was no different. Writes well, erases well and has the best direct screw-through mounting system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy dry erase board for a home classroom.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for use with the All About Reading magnet tiles. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MsWhiskers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a bad crease on the board and on the box. Flimsy construction. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: FSK

customer_reviews.title: NO RETURNS ACCEPTED.
customer_reviews.text: Beside the fact, that one day Prime turned into 9 day ( ! ) - there was no way to cancel/return this order. We don't need it next week. Buyers beware - NO RETURNS ON IT ! ( the message says : 'For safety reasons, items containing flammable liquids or gases can’t be returned to Amazon. For more information or help, please contact us.' ) Nonsense. But this is Amazon exactly - big nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: TSH

customer_reviews.title: Size measurements are *not* exact 😐
customer_reviews.text: Fine quality, but not the size advertised. This is maddening for those of us who actually measure and need an exact fit! If 36-ish x 48-ish inches is the size you need, then you’re in luck. Add to cart. I’ve attached measurement photos to help everyone else. Also, this is probably the case with any white board, but my toddler colors all over the aluminum frame and it is tricky to clean. Lots of grooves and doesn’t wipe clean with eraser or water alone. White board spray cleaner works, though. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen E.

customer_reviews.title: Comes damages.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with my shipment. It came dented in two areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screws are CHEAP and WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.text: I got this product and was excited, but I have had 2 issues with it. One, they only sent 2 screws and two, if you screw into a stud the screws will just strip. Now we have stripped screws that are going to be a nightmare to get out. The first we used a battery operated driver, the second screw we just used a hand one. Both stripped!!
customer_reviews.author: Orvin C. Jenks

customer_reviews.title: Great size for teaching my kids during distant learning..but difficult to clean...
customer_reviews.text: Just received the item today. I purchase this item to help me and my kids during this distant learning school year. Easy to write on. Great size and affordable but I am having a hard time erasing and cleaning it between use. I use a dry erase board eraser and I followed the instruction with erasing the markers with a dry cloth and then using a wet cloth to clean the board. However, I can still see markings. I am using a dry erase markers I purchased from Walmart. I believe they are Walmart's brand product. I will try a different dry erase markers to see if it's the markers that is the problem.
customer_reviews.author: solace0626

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised. Very nice
customer_reviews.text: The whiteboard is sturdy and professional looking. It writes beautifully and is a very good magnet board. I'm super impressed with it. A word of caution on use: the packaging warns you not to move magnets around on the whiteboard because they could cause scratching. My three-year-old got hold of it and tried to "erase" the board with a magnet. Scratches everywhere. Heed the warning and be nice to this very well-made product.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not a great start with this product. First it was delivered to the wrong address (although that's in UPS), second the board arrived warped (see photo). Third the tray design is horrible. Does not lock in place. Always falls out easily. Need to super glue or tape it. Lastly the directions are poor not easy to follow. It's a white board and it functions for that purpose, but not a high quality design. We'll see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Franny J

customer_reviews.title: Screws Directly into Wall
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a well made, nice looking whiteboard. It does screw directly into the wall and had I known that I may not have purchased it. I thought it would hang on a screw or screws with metal hangers affixed to the back. But it’s securely affixed directly into to my wall now. One nice thing is the tray that hangs on the bottom (to hold markers and eraser) can be easily removed after affixing whiteboard to wall if you decide you don’t need it, and can be put back on again if you change your mind.
customer_reviews.author: napria

customer_reviews.title: It's NOT MAGNETIC
customer_reviews.text: This board is not magnetic, if it was magnetic, metal would stick to it. It is, instead, metal and magnets stick to it. Big difference! I bought 2 and intended to use them to hold metal crafting dies, but of course metal doesn't stick to metal, so they are worthless to me. Don't advertise something as magnetic if it has NO magnetic ability!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Holzer

customer_reviews.title: A darker pink than displayed on my monitor but very nice board
customer_reviews.text: This board was packaged well and received quickly. The item is a darker pink tha we viewed on the Amazon posting. It is well made, was easy to install, came with all necessary hardware, and has proven very functional. Magnets hold well and it is easy to erase drymarkers. Recommended without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared for possible disappointments
customer_reviews.text: I only received the whiteboard. Everything else was missing: no markers, no eraser, no marker tray, no magnets, no mounting hardware, and no instructions. I also was very disappointed that it arrived in a giant box with a smaller box and lots of brown paper stuffing inside. And I’m not thrilled by the mounting style.
customer_reviews.author: Chellie

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to purchase a white board for PT school for drawing out large concepts, and I was searching to find a good size for an affordable price. This whiteboard is huge and came in perfect condition! It comes with all the parts to hang it on the wall, 1 marker, and two magnets, and a little ledge to put your markers. I won't be hanging this on the wall but I thought that was really nice! (I for some reason can't add photos to my review but the board is so nice!)
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Defective surface that won’t erase.
customer_reviews.text: The surface of this whiteboard is defective. I absolutely cannot properly erase with an eraser, with water, or with whiteboard cleaning solution. In the up-close pic you can see the wavy pattern reflected in the light. I may have to literally throw the whole thing out. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. It was broken when I received it and there were items missing
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months, in preparation for home schooling my daughter, and though I haven't used it too much yet, it's held up well. I've had in on the wall for a few weeks and I wasn't completely sure it seemed sturdy, based on reviews and the depth of the screw holes, but it's working out just fine. I'd say it's a little over priced for the quality but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our son for Christmas. Disappointed to discover a dent in the middle of the board.
customer_reviews.author: amy yoder

customer_reviews.title: Very worthwhile investment!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It was easy to hang and to assemble the tray. I use it every day. I am able to organize my days - for my personal life and my work life. I work from home and it makes it possible for me to keep my clients and their needs visible, keep a running list of 'to do's' and books I want to read - plus it is magnetic, so I can also attach notes, receipts, stamps, and tickets I have printed out. It has a smooth surface which makes writing on it a dream, and everything erases completely without any residue. It is perfect for what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Chantil Rose

customer_reviews.title: DONT DO IT
customer_reviews.text: The package came in tact but the board was such a low quality. It had dents and bumps in it. It is NOT worth the $30. Even if it came perfect, the quality is low. Go buy one cheaper at Walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Heart4Heart

customer_reviews.title: Great White Board!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this white board to help with home schooling--perfect size, nicely made, and magnetic. It arrived in perfect condition--well packaged and protected. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great magnetic white board!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of putting magnets and stuff all over our fridge doors and looked into a magnetic board. This one is also a whiteboard so it does double duty. It's very well made and is big enough to move all of the clutter off of our fridge and onto this board. I would definitely buy this again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: PCTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Color not as shown
customer_reviews.text: It’s just like any other dry erase board. Color is way off than shown. It’s a dark pink. Was going to return because of that, but decided to keep it
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: i wanted a dry erase board just for myself to organize ideas and i didn't expect anything fancy but this is almost useless. don't waste your money, spend a bit more for something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction, poor mounting materials
customer_reviews.text: Do not use their anchors: your board will come off the wall. This is mine after only a week of being mounted.. It fell off the wall, hit its side on the floor, and now it is broken open. Inside appears to be cheap cardboard with the surfaces glued on; it came apart easily and I can't fix it now. Board is still usable but looks really ugly with the damage, and can't be mounted on the wall anymore as the left side of the frame comes off. Cheap construction, cheap materials. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Akemi Saoshi

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to hang
customer_reviews.text: Why on earth would you need to drill FOUR screws into the wall just to hang a whiteboard??? I have great picture hooks that will hold 50 pounds, a simple nail in the wall does the trick. But there is no way to hang this other than drill 4 screws into the wall. I would never have bought it if I had known this. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Snowbird

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this whiteboard to do math on since I'm going back to school and I needed someplace to do math problems on, otherwise, I'd be going through tons of paper. This board is good enough. It's not the most study thing, but it's just okay. It seems to be made of some thick cardboard with a plastic whiteboard cover. It writes smooth and erases well. For $30, its good enough.
customer_reviews.author: G. Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, high quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product that works great. I put mine up vertically. It works either way with the marker tray. You'll have to buy your own markers though if you want some decent ones.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Cadwallader

customer_reviews.title: Delivered broken goods
customer_reviews.text: Damaged out of the box and no returns? Very disappointed. The white board is creased and bent all the way down the front in multiple places. I couldn't hang it on the wall because it's not even flat.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Pharr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teaching math through Zoom during this pandemic
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me as I am a schoolteacher navigating through this pandemic and teaching Middle school math through zoom & the board helped a lot! I was able to work out the problems on the board on a video and send it to my students!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great Magnetic Whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: We love this whiteboard! It is sturdy, easy to hang (we used velcro "command strips") and easy to clean. I also really appreciate that the back of the board shows a clean metal surface. In our location, much of the back can be seen, and I was relieved I didn't have to add anything to make the back "acceptable looking".
customer_reviews.author: cme123

customer_reviews.title: good qualilty
customer_reviews.text: My husband is getting forgetful, so I bought this to place in living room where he sits in recliner all day. I write what day it is, and if I go outside or to town or garage, I write where I am and about what time I should be back in living room. It has brought him comfort knowing where I am and when I will be back..
customer_reviews.author: P. Meisner

customer_reviews.title: Great whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: The board arrived in perfect condition. It's quite sturdy! I like the marker tray which you can remove if you wish. My magnets stick without a problem. Whiteboard erases easily without leaving streaks or marker stains. Overall, I'm absolutely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CLH

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the versatility of being able to mount this landscape or portrait with the tray for the eraser at the bottom. It’s sturdy, easy to mount and looks great in my Pantry. I keep it in there to write a honey-do-list and notes to my kids and have them keep a running list of household items that we need for the week.
customer_reviews.author: Angela S.

customer_reviews.title: White board
customer_reviews.text: Great white board. 4 stars because that marker holder isn't attached when you get it, and well I didn't realized it didn't line up right, so I ended up messing it up badly. Now I cant get it on and I cant take it off. Make sure you have the piece lined up just right. Works great. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Snider

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought three so far and i'm probably going to buy another two for the office! Markers a little meh but they do the trick. Buy a magnetic eraser and you'll be set. Nice and lightweight so managing it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Donnachie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to clean, came used though
customer_reviews.text: It feels sturdy once on the wall, off of the wall and fresh out of the box it feels flimsy. The back of it is bent/creased. The front of it also already had marks on it, like pen scribbles. The box was also a little ripped and taped shut. But its okay
customer_reviews.author: Ori

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Price are match
customer_reviews.text: Well designed with accurate black frame. Easy to erase marks. Smooth surface is perfect for writing and making notes. And what’s important it helps me to see visually everything what I planned and need to do
customer_reviews.author: Bekzod Abdulkhakov

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!  No returns! Came damaged!
customer_reviews.text: The white board part is made of a cardboard type material and came with a dent in it. And it is not eligible for returns. I spent over $50 on this piece of junk. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Pink Board
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my granddaughters room. (age 9) Her favorite color is Pink, so she was thrilled. It was easy to install, (4 screws, one for each corner). We also purchase fun magnets for the board and it worked great. She is able to put her favorite drawings up for display, held with the magnets. Highly recommend, great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ann Morales

customer_reviews.title: The Quality is THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I am a production manager and run schedules daily. I needed some new boards and decided to try these. They are TERRIFIC for the price you can't beat it! They even come with a little marker...how cute! Super easy to hang and easy to erase!! That is the biggest deal about dry erase boards are how they erase. I TOTALLY RECOMMEND THESE for how they erase on the board! It's clean with NO RESIDUE!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Item came damaged although packaging was intact
customer_reviews.text: Board came damaged! It looks like it took a significant hit near the middle part, and it's so bended that there's an oblique line that stretches from one side to the opposite side. So I can't put up the board anywhere because if I put it on any straight surface it will keep wiggling! Not acceptable! And I can't write on it either since it's bended! I demand a refund... It's really sad, because aside from that damage, the board seems nice. I blame both Amazon and the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Met my need of a good sized dry erase board at a reasonable price. Was packed very well so arrived undamaged. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Pat in TN

customer_reviews.title: Standard white board
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my office. I used 4 of the Velcro style command strips to hang it on the wall and it’s been going strong for two months now. The little tray for markers is very convenient. This board is exactly what you’d expect from a white board.
customer_reviews.author: aasay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hang on the wall. Very nice and elegant.
customer_reviews.text: We use the Magnetic Board as a place for out magnets from traveling all over the world. It's an excellent solution and it looks fantastic. All beautiful memories on one board:-))))
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made! This came with a large dent down the left side. It looks like it was folded. I should have learned my lesson that unless it is easy to repackage and get to UPD, do not order on Amazon! Much more hassle than it’s worth. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for my grandchildren's activities :)
customer_reviews.text: I hung this on our cloak closet at the entry and I purchased magnetic zoo animals, a magnetic US map puzzle + multiple dry erase markers - PERFECT to keep the toddlers busy and away from the screen! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rose Marie Q. Bensadon

customer_reviews.title: Great for my teen son!
customer_reviews.text: My son, with his ever so busy schedule, loves this dry-erase board. We purchased 1/4" 3M tape so he could customize a weekly school/chore/activity calendar with reminders. The board was packaged well and arrived really fast!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Nishi

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put up on the wall and it came with dry erase markers and a small shelf to hold them, which comes on and off easily. It's help me un-clutter in these crazy times!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Ferguson-Wagstaffe

customer_reviews.title: Great for DIstance Learning Classroom
customer_reviews.text: We set up a Distance Learning classroom for our daughter and bought this wipe board so she can write notes, hang things via magnets. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONE WRONG AS A FAITHFUL, FREQUENT CUSTOMER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received an empty box!!!!! Small enough to for a regular size phone book, NO ITEM. THE DRY ERASE BOARD IS WAY LARGER AND THE EMPTY BOX I RECEIVED WAS TROWN OUT!! THE BOARD WAS A BIRTDAY GIFT FOR MY GRANDDAUGHTER AND HAS PASSED WITH MUCH DISAPOINTMENT FOR HER!! I DO TONS OF BUSINESS WITH AMAZON AND WANT MY BOARD. ITS PAID FOR AND I EXPECT IT TO BE SENT ASAP
customer_reviews.author: CharBritt

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works well for my home gym. I used command strips to put on the Sheetrock instead of nails. Sturdy but light enough to hold up well too so you do not have to make holes in your wall.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Great for home office
customer_reviews.text: This white board attaches easily and works great for home office. Just find where you want, screw it into wall, and get to work. Cleans easily and haven't had any trouble with it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: I bought this white board to study for my nursing school classes. I love it! Worth the price. Have not hung it on my wall (not sure if this would be easy or hard to hang) because I prefer to be able to take it with me to other rooms in my house or take it with me to other places for study groups. It’s spacious and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Polan

customer_reviews.title: Missing Magnets— no way to recover missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Board looks and works fine however the magnets were missing in the packaging. Because there is no return policy, I’m SOL.
customer_reviews.author: R. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Came in a great condition despite my fear after reading reviews. Perfect size and has everything needed. We are happy about our purcjase
customer_reviews.author: YP

customer_reviews.title: Hard to erase, No response from seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this whiteboard for my kid, didnt use much may be 3 months. Its hard to erase the white board. I emailed the seller in Aug for replacement since this white board comes with lifetime warranty. No response from seller yet.
customer_reviews.author: Romit

customer_reviews.title: Quality Board ✨🍃
customer_reviews.text: It came very quickly nicely package. No scratches or anything on the board just pulling off the plastic part was a little bit annoying but overall worth it after getting all of it off the ends. Board works like a charm and perfectly for what I need it for! & Also was magnetic so I could put my place holders on it too! 🍃✨
customer_reviews.author: Yaya Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Not 48x36
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item because the title says it's 48x36. The space I was hoping to hang this could only accommodate a 48in wide board (nothing more, nothing less). Unfortunately, when the item arrived I went to hang the boards and much to my surprise, they were about an inch short. Now I'll have to install a 2x4 to reach the full length so that the board will have something to attach to. Very disappointed. Not what it's advertised it to be.
customer_reviews.author: ckcotton9

customer_reviews.title: Great quality,  nice look. Built very well!
customer_reviews.text: Great board! Packaged well with protector film on surface. Nice hardware with plugs to cover screws. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Logan E

customer_reviews.title: Eraser tray would not fit the track. Stuck and ...
customer_reviews.text: Eraser tray would not fit the track. Stuck and couldnt get it removed. Do not buy this wothout getting a different marker and eraser tray.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Slape

customer_reviews.title: I hate virtual learning
customer_reviews.text: Since our 7th grader is teaching her 5th grade brother she needed a big white board. This is working great for them.
customer_reviews.author: NC letter carrier

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 for co-workers. It is just what they were looking for to put in their offices. One arrived with a large crack in the back but only showed up in the front as a bump. It was still quite usable so it was not returned, just noted. We did compare prices for products which made this a good choice for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Naughton

customer_reviews.title: For my wife's to do list.
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted this to write down goals and her to do list. She has resigned to sharing it with the kids who love drawing on it and straying from their side of the board to my wife's which frustrates her to no end. The moral? If you have kids, get two!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: I give this white board a 4 I wanna say 3.5 but I feel a 3 is a bit low in stars, mines came with a little nick in it also this sticker they put on it bothers me so much and I can’t get it off , I would return it but for how long it took me to get it up by my self I’m going to just keep it , also had a smudge that was kinda tuff to get out though I’m sure it was the cheap marker it comes with I recommend buying your own
customer_reviews.author: Daylan williams

customer_reviews.title: item delivered to me in damaged condition
customer_reviews.text: and even better, I cant return it. Thanks Amazon for that btw. Now im stuck with a massive white board that wasnt cheap with 3 massive defects on it. I cant even write on it in a straight line because of the marks that run through this board. Garbage mans dream I guess...thanks for wasting my money
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Great board quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great board! Easy to install. As described. All parts there. Well packed. I use it to keep track of engine parts when building an engine.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: When they say 2’x3’ they’re full of it. The size including the frame is 2’x3’ but you lose quite a bit of actual white board space. I wouldn’t purchase it again but I don’t have time to wait for another one
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Vision board
customer_reviews.text: Love this board . Use it as My motivation and vision board .. I could only get black marker to work on the blue colored board . I wanted to be able to have a variety of colors
customer_reviews.author: Jasmyne

customer_reviews.title: Idk what’s going on, but please fix it! But great product!
customer_reviews.text: My stuff came bent!! The box tore! Like I’ve waited 2 weeks for this and it’s messed up?!?! I think the mail carrier was careless. But as far as the board itself is beautiful. Great quality! I love the color! And it’s very magnetic! Thank you for producing this. I just hate that the carriers were careless about it. I’ll probably buy another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: But it for your children
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the money. High quality build. The only thing I would add is that it’s a little heavy which can make it hard to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.text: Huge. This thing is giant. Holes for mounting on all four corners so you could hang it vertically as we did. This thing shipped properly also.
customer_reviews.author: Steed

customer_reviews.title: Upon opening package, there was a huge dent down ...
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening package, there was a huge dent down the middle of the board making it unusable. Unfortunately had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Elise S

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great board. It takes a few uses for the marker ink to not stay on after you wipe it off. We had to use the cleaning spray in the beginning Every time we wrote something on the board. Eventually it became seasoned and we didn’t have to do that. Give it a little time. I love the little market/eraser holder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: The board is exactly as described and not too heavy. Cleans well too. Going to purchase a 2nd one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Temmera

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and suits my WFH needs
customer_reviews.text: Using this board for a to-do list and to plan my work. Easy install and seem to cleanup easily.
customer_reviews.author: Goran

customer_reviews.title: Super good
customer_reviews.text: This wideboard worked really well, the words are easy to erase and the whiteboard itself was easy to hang up on my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with markers and magnets already! Don’t waste money on extra unless you want more colors than blue, black, and red. Easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Reece

customer_reviews.title: Great Whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a home office. I hung it next to my desk and file cabinet to keep short term reminders. It works great - easy to erase and the magnetic feature is a great plus.
customer_reviews.author: DarlH

customer_reviews.title: Right on the money.
customer_reviews.text: I dint want to drill holes into my wall, so I used 3M wall hanging stickers to mount the board. It’s the perfect size and works well for my design brainstorming sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Shravan Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Need a bigger one..
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to put on the garage wall for notes while rebuilding the 79 CJ5. My GF promptly drew wieners on it. She likes it. I no longer have room for notes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: So helpful for homeschooling & household!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, cleans easily and it is just perfect for homeschooling and household memos.
customer_reviews.author: D  Delacoeur

customer_reviews.title: Best price and well-made.
customer_reviews.text: Best price and well-made whiteboard. I hung two of them vertically and use magnets to post prayers on them. My own little prayer “war room”.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi in TN

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and you can’t return!!!
customer_reviews.text: Came with a HUGE dent in the back. Just received yesterday and very disappointed. You can see the debt through the front of the board as well. Also big black scratch mark on front.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Nesbitt

product_meta.title: Lockways Magnetic Dry Erase Board - Magnetic Whiteboard/White Board 36 x 24 Inch, 1 Dry Erase Markers, 2 Magnets for School, Home, Office
feature_bullets: EXCELLENT WRITING & DRY ERASE PERFORMANCE (EXACT SIZE 35. 8” x 24”): Suitable for Almost Branded Dry Erase Markers for Office and Home and University and Dormitory, Smooth Scratch-Resistant Premium Surfaces, ULTRA-CLEAN Wipe-Off, 5-Years Under Normal usage. Suggest Porcelain/Enameled Magnetic Whiteboard for Heavy Usage

STURDY AND DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: NEVER Warp, NEVER Crease, NEVER Bubble after Years, Anti-Scratch SILVER Aluminum Frame (NEVER Turn Black), Round Nylon Corners (NEVER Broken), Detachable Silver Aluminum Marker Tray
ONE-STOP BUYING: 1 Magnetic Dry Erase Board, 1 Dry Erase Marker, 2 Magnets, GREAT for Office and Home and University and Dormitory
WALL-MOUNTED IN PORTRAIT OR LANDSCAPE: NEVER Worried about Drop-Down, Concealed Installation-Kits Offered in the Box, Detachable Aluminum Marker Tray

WORRY-FREE BUYING: 8 Layers Reinforced Shipping Box 98% Free of damage in the transit, LIFETIME REPLACEMENT SERVICE with expedited shipping 100% Satisfactory. Please send the photos of damaged board by EMAIL. FAST SERVICE IN 12 HOURS
